about_the_game:
It was supposed to be a simple job, but it turned out to be more complicated than I could've ever expected...

A week ago I was at the Adventures' Guild. I wasn't looking for anything too complicated. An easy assignment for a good amount of gold. The man at the counter said that he had a job that fit the description...

He mentioned something about the village being remote and far away, which was why no one else had been interested in the job. My contact for the job was a woman named Reanna. The job description: help Reanna sing her song. And I didn't know what that meant.  I accepted the quest, though, and started my journey to the far away town. That's where our story begins.

A Song in Elyel Nalore is a 2D metroidvania with RPG elements.  Defeating enemies gains experience points.  Your HP and other stats will increase every time you level up.  There are also secret orbs scattered around Elyel Nalore.  Each orb can give you benefits in the difficult fights to come.

The game also has platforming and puzzle solving.  Time your jumps carefully, or you could face fall damage.  Push blocks and explore every nook and cranny to try to uncover all the secrets.  Try your hardest to get a 100% completion rate!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo and 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo and 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Plays better with Xbox controller.

short_description: You play as Christine, a hired sword, who has taken on a mysterious job from the guild. Fight monsters and level up to gain new skills. Or perhaps find secret orbs to increase your maximum power. Enjoy beautiful pixel art as you run, jump, and discover all the mysteries of Elyel Nalore.
